testimonalData.text: A trusted friend recommended that I call Lance Clarke after my arrest. As soon as I entered the courtroom, I could tell that Mr. Clarke was highly respected by the prosecution and courtroom staff alike.

testimonalData.text: Phillip Hamilton saved my life. He represented me in a highly publicized national case. I was vilified by the media. I was charged with multiple felonies and misdemeanors.
